com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.web

Class WebCmsRenderUtilityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.web.WebCmsRenderUtilityService

  • @Service(value="wcmRenderUtils")
public class WebCmsRenderUtilityService
extends Object
    Contains utility methods most often used for rendering. This object is also exposed as expression object #wcm on thymeleaf.
    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Detail

      • imageUrl

        public String imageUrl(ImageWebCmsComponentModel imageComponent)
        Build a url to the original image file of the image configured on a WebCmsImage.
        Parameters:
        imageComponent - that contains the image
        Returns:
        image url or null if no image was present

      • imageUrl

        public String imageUrl(ImageWebCmsComponentModel imageComponent,
                       int boxWidth,
                       int boxHeight)
        Build a url to the image file of the image configured on a WebCmsImage. If possible the resulting image should be scaled down to fit in the box dimensions specified. Note that it depends on the actual WebCmsImageConnector used if this will be the case.
        Parameters:
        imageComponent - that contains the image
        boxWidth - image should be scaled down to this maximum width
        boxHeight - image should be scaled down to this maximum height
        Returns:
        image url or null if no image was present

      • imageUrl

        public String imageUrl(WebCmsImage image)
        Build a url to the original image file of a WebCmsImage.
        Parameters:
        image - to generate the url for
        Returns:
        image url

      • imageUrl

        public String imageUrl(WebCmsImage image,
                       int boxWidth,
                       int boxHeight)
        Build a url to the image file of the WebCmsImage. If possible the resulting image should be scaled down to fit in the box dimensions specified. Note that it depends on the actual WebCmsImageConnector used if this will be the case.
        Parameters:
        image - to generate the url for
        boxWidth - image should be scaled down to this maximum width
        boxHeight - image should be scaled down to this maximum height
        Returns:
        image url

      • component

        public WebCmsComponentModel component(String componentName)
        Retrieve a component by name from the default scope. Will search parent scopes.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        Returns:
        model or null if not found

      • componentFromScope

        public WebCmsComponentModel componentFromScope(String componentName,
                                               String scopeName)
        Retrieve a component by name from the specified scope. Will not search parent scopes.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        scopeName - scope in which to search for the component
        Returns:
        model or null if not found

      • componentFromScope

        public WebCmsComponentModel componentFromScope(String componentName,
                                               String scopeName,
                                               boolean searchParentScopes)
        Retrieve a component by name from the specified scope. Depending on the value of the searchParentScopes parameter, parent scopes will be searched for the component.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        scopeName - scope in which to search for the component
        searchParentScopes - should parent scopes be searched
        Returns:
        model or null if not found

      • member

        public WebCmsComponentModel member(String componentName,
                                   WebCmsComponentModel container)
        Retrieve a container member by name. Allows the container itself to be null or not a container model, in both cases the member returned will be null. If the container is a proxy component, the target component will be investigated.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the member component
        container - in which to search
        Returns:
        model of null if not found or container was null

      • members

        public List<WebCmsComponentModel> members(WebCmsComponentModel container)
        Retrieve the member components of a container. If the container is null or not a container model, the returned list will always be empty. If the container is a proxy component, the target component will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        container - for which to fetch the members
        Returns:
        list of member components

      • url

        public String url(WebCmsAsset asset)
        Retrieve the primary URL for a specific asset.
        Parameters:
        asset - to get the primary URL for
        Returns:
        url or null
